creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
Hi,
can you supply some details about your problems :
- a snippet from your build file,
- the output of ant -verbose, so that the exact failure/exception appears
Did you set the separator attribute in your invocation of the ftp task :
you should do
<ftp separator="\" .../>
this is to tell the system that the remote file separator is \
Cheers,
Antoine

Try the latest commons-net from CVS + the latest jakarta-oro from CVS (exact
version numbers ... are in the manual of ant 1.6.1 under installation dependencies).
This should fix your problem, I am closing this bug report for now.
